articles.author: Julius Young
articles.title: Lea Michele is creating a ‘kiss of death’ for her career following allegations of bad behavior: PR expert - Fox News
articles.description: Lea Michele’s career could be on the brink of disaster if she doesn’t get her act together following a revolving door of allegations of incessant poor behavior from former co-stars against the actress.
articles.content:
EXCLUSIVE:Lea Michele’s career could be on the brink of disaster if she doesn’t get her act together following a slew of allegations of poor behavior from former co-stars against the actress.
